pull_request.title: Fix #199221 elahmad.com
pull_request.body:
Issue: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/199221

The issue is caused by the rule `||pahtag.tech^$third-party` in AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, so I'm not sure if this is the right file for this.
